bibl.title: A New Fragment from the Apion Dossier in New Haven (P. CtYBR inv. 4357).
bibl.note: The fragment offers points of correspondence with P. Daris Inv. 1 (= S.B. XII, 11163), a receipt or notice from a zygostatês which certainly belongs to the Apion dossier. Oxyrhynchite, ca. A.D. 590?
bibl.seg: HICKEY Todd M., A New Fragment from the Apion Dossier in New Haven (P. CtYBR inv. 4357).
The fragment offers points of correspondence with P. Daris Inv. 1 (= S.B. XII, 11163), a receipt or notice from a zygostatês which certainly belongs to the Apion dossier. Oxyrhynchite, ca. A.D. 590?
